Actionable Insights with Predictive Analytics for Marketers, May 9

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Customer Analytics, Data Preparation, Looker, Marketing

Learn how your predictions can only be as good as your data, how to fix imperfect data, how to structure your customer data for optimal predictive power, and more.




WEDNESDAY, MAY 9, 2018 - 11:00 AM PT / 2:00 PM ET
Traditional marketing analytics or scoreboards are essential for evaluating the success or failure of past marketing activities. But today's marketers can leverage advanced marketing techniques like predictive modeling for customer behavior, predictive lead scoring, and all sorts of strategies based on predictive analytics insights. Predictive techniques can make your marketing investment much more efficient, but regularly validating results remains critical.

Join our experts from NICE,  Looker and RedPoint Global and find out how to get better marketing results with predictive analytics.

Attend this webcast and you will learn:
  • Why your predictions can only be as good as your data, and how to fix imperfect data
  • How to structure your customer data for optimal predictive power
  • How the concept of Zero-Segment Marketing can overcome the challenges associated with the traditional approach to customer segmentation
  • How predictive analytics can fuel the always-on dynamic customer journey and power real-time adaptive marketing
REGISTER NOW to attend the webinar "Actionable Insights with Predictive Analytics for Marketers."

Audio is streamed over the Internet, so turn up your computer speakers!
 
MODERATOR   PRESENTERS          
Bob Fernekees
Publisher
CRM magazine		 Matt Reading
VP, Customer Journey Solutions
NICE		 Daniel Mintz
Chief Data Evangelist
Looker		 Patrick Tripp
VP of Product Strategy
RedPoint Global
